snippet: Britain's number one tennis player Andy Murray is fighting on two fronts this week - to secure his second single's trophy at Wimbledon and to help defeat malaria, one of the biggest killers of children globally....
lead_paragraph: Britain's number one tennis player Andy Murray is fighting on two fronts this week - to secure his second single's trophy at Wimbledon and to help defeat malaria, one of the biggest killers of children globally.

headline.print_headline: British Tennis Champ Andy Murray Has a Smash at Malaria on Court
headline.main: British Tennis Champ Andy Murray Has a Smash at Malaria on Court
